com.viaoa.jsp

Class OARadio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jsp.OACheckBox
      • com.viaoa.jsp.OARadio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OAJspComponent, OATableEditor, java.io.Serializable

    public class OARadio
extends OACheckBox
    Controls an html input type=radio bind to hub, property show/hide, that can be bound to property enabled, that can be bound to property ajax submit on change
    Author:
    vvia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
